name: commit_message
description: Generate a conventional commit message from staged changes
template:
Based on the following git diff, generate a conventional commit message.

Commit types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, perf, ci, build

Git diff:
```
{{diff}}
```

{{#if context}}Additional context: {{context}}{{/if}}

Generate a commit message in this format:
<type>(<scope>): <description>

<body>

Co-Authored-By: {{author}}

variables.description: The git diff of staged changes

examples.description: Generate commit for a bug fix

name: pr_description
description: Generate a pull request description from branch changes
template:
Generate a pull request description for the following changes.

Branch: {{branch}}
Base: {{base}}

Commit messages:
{{commits}}

Files changed:
{{files}}

{{#if summary}}Summary: {{summary}}{{/if}}

Generate a PR description with:
## Summary
<brief description>

## Changes
<bullet list of changes>

## Testing
<how to test>

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No breaking changes

name: code_review
description: Provide code review feedback on git diff
template:
Review the following code changes and provide constructive feedback.

Focus areas: {{focus_areas}}

Diff:
```
{{diff}}
```

Provide feedback in these categories:
1. **Critical Issues** - Bugs, security vulnerabilities, breaking changes
2. **Improvements** - Performance, readability, maintainability suggestions
3. **Nitpicks** - Style, naming conventions (optional)
4. **Positive Feedback** - What was done well

Be specific with line references where applicable.
